text: Bethany makheiya Simon inti apumma kaphar ri kaleiroon miring inkhat innna Jisu'n abak a-inna omlaikhan, numeisa inkhat lungngoi beel kasipchei inthiang nard makheiya insum amankatam sariak choiya aheiwa. Numeisanu khan sariak beelkha amakoiya arim kahoi sariak kha Jisu lu-ah aleibun. Luk 7:37,38
